entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Baddeck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 4.2°C
Wind: SW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
